name: DogDogDog
description:
"DogDogDog" is a horror adventure game set in modern times.

◆ Story

Recently, you have been feeling like someone is stalking you.

Every day, you feel anxious, sensing eyes and hearing noises all around you.

Suddenly, you remember the pet dog you used to have.

And then, you encounter a "DOG"...

Yet life goes on.

◆ Game Features

- A walking simulator where various events occur as you walk.
- Progress the story by examining objects.
- There are no quest markers or time limits, allowing for relaxed gameplay.
- Experience occasional terror from the appearance of dogs.

Playtime: 10 to 30 minutes

◆ Streaming Guidelines

- Streaming is possible without permission for individuals and companies alike.
